import React, { useState } from 'react'; import Login from '../../components/login/Login' // import LoginDynamic from '../../components/login/LoginDynamic'; import '../../components/login/dynamic.scss' const UserAuth = () => { const [toggle, setToggle] = useState(false) return (

); }; export default UserAuth;
